name: right_arm_ik_type
description: Which IK setup should we apply to the right arm?
label: IK Type
items: Two IK targets, one for the lower arm and one for the upper arm. Do not add IK to the shoulder
Three IK targets, one for the lower arm, one for the upper arm and one for the shoulder
A single IK chain including lower arm and upper arm.
A single IK chain including lower arm, upper arm and shoulder.
